climbs.name: Scarlett Johansson
climbs.fa: The One and Only Alex Rice.

content.description: Gorgeous Highball with great face movement and a committing top out. Put up by one of the greatest.
content.location: From Voodoo Magic in the Twisted Tree area, head Southwest to meet a faint trail headed directly west. Following the trail brings you to the Sunshine Wall area. Continue on the trail inside the canyon. Upon entering the canyon, the Wall will be on your right.

content.description:
A few different lines on this tiny, miniture sized block.

Far Left-hand side, follow the arete up. Easy Warm up.

Up the center, Start sitting on bad crimps, move up striaght.

Right hand side, Start sitting on the bad crimps with a big move out Right to the good hold. Follow the arete up.
content.location: Headed up to the Upper Parking Lot, you'll see a pull out on the left hand side of the dirt road, helping you avoid the crappy and huge ruts on the main road. Park there and you'll see the Party Rock about 30 feet south. Directly off the road. Can't miss it.

content.description: Climbs the middle of the face of Half Dome Boulder. Good moves on solid granite.
content.location: Located on the Half Dome Boulder between The Glen and Lost Wall

content.description:
Again, There are plenty of lines on this guy and they are all awesome.

Start on the good Jug low on the lefthand side of the boulder. Move up and meet up with the crimp rail moving out right to the top.

Harder, follow the same line but on the lower rail moving out right.
content.location: Head west towards the lake past Arden's Middle Finger, (climb it first) Through the Open Meadow Area and the boulder is about 50 yards down.

content.description: Directly across the road from The Party Rock Boulder. Sit start up to the right-hand jug, follow the tufa up. Big last move to the lip.
Big Arete. Harder than it looks
content.protection: Lots of Crashpads and good spots.
content.location: Small pullout before you enter Riverside State Park on the left hand side of the road. The Epic Arete Area is on the right hand side through the small trees, headed west about 30 yards.

content.description: Start sitting underneath the overhang, follow the crack up until you can make a big move to the lefthand sloper. From there, crossover to the face and climb up with an enormous and great move to a good gaston.
content.location: Follow the dirt road from the upper parking lot south until it curves west, head into the small trees to the first tall wall you come to. VooDoo magic is next to the Twisted Tree west down the wall.

content.description: Really cool line that starts in the tunnel under the rock climbing out of the ground into fun movement to the top out. Also, There's a line on the righthand arete that is also awesome and unknown.
content.location: Head west towards the lake from the Upper parking lot inbetween The Glen Wall and The Lost Wall. Keep on the lefthand side going up a small crevace until the trail opens up into an Open Meadow Area. The line will be on the wall behind you on your left. (southeast)

content.description: There's a bunch in this area and almost always sees sun, so it's a good, open spot to hang out on nice days with easy climbs.
content.location: Follow the faint trail southwest of Voodo Magic towards the lake, through the small trees. It'll open up into this area.
